description: This module provides functionality to extract, add and modify data from SQLite databases.

functions.name: clear-params
functions.description: Set all parameters to null inside a prepared statement.
functions.summary: Set all parameters to null inside a prepared statement.

parameters.name: pstmnt
parameters.description: the prepared statement already compiled as xs:anyURI.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-PREPARED-STATEMENT if $pstmnt is not a valid SQLite prepared statement.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: close-prepared
functions.description: Close and free resources associated to a prepared statement.
functions.summary: Close and free resources associated to a prepared statement.

parameters.name: pstmnt
parameters.description: the prepared statement to be closed.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-PREPARED-STATEMENT if $pstmnt is not a valid SQLite prepared statement.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: commit
functions.description: Commits all pending update operations in this SQLite database.
functions.summary: Commits all pending update operations in this SQLite database.

parameters.name: conn
parameters.description: the SQLite database object as xs:anyURI.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-SQLITE-OBJECT if $conn is not a valid SQLite database object.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: connect

parameters.name: db-name
parameters.description: the SQLite database name to be opened as xs:string.

returns.description: the SQLite database object as xs:anyURI.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:CANT-OPEN-DB if the database name doesn't exist or it couldn't be opened.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:COMPILED-WITHOUT-DISK-ACCESS if a non-in-memory database is requested and the module is built without filesystem access.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: connect
functions.signature: ($db-name as xs:string, $options as object()?) as xs:anyURI external
functions.description:
Connect to a SQLite database with optional options.

All options are true/false values. Available options are: open-read-only, open-create, open-no-mutex, and open-shared-cache. The options are of the form: 

 {
   "open_read_only" : true,
   "open_create     : false,
   ...
 }
functions.summary: Connect to a SQLite database with optional options.

parameters.name: db-name
parameters.description: the SQLite database name to be opened as xs:string.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: a JSON object containing SQLite connection options.

returns.description: the SQLite database object as xs:anyURI.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:CANT-OPEN-DB if the database name doesn't exist or it couldn't be opened.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:UNKNOWN-OPTION if there is any unknown option specified.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:COMPILED-WITHOUT-DISK-ACCESS if a non-in-memory database is requested and the module is built without filesystem access.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: execute-query-prepared
functions.description:
Execute a query (select command) over an already connected SQLite
 database object.
functions.summary: Execute a query (select command) over an already connected SQLite database object.

parameters.name: pstmnt
parameters.description: the query command to be executed as xs:anyURI.

returns.description: a sequence of JSON objects representing the query results.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-PREPARED-STATEMENT if $pstmnt is not a valid SQLite prepared statement.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: execute-query
functions.signature: ($conn as xs:anyURI, $sqlstr as xs:string) as object()* external
functions.description:
Executes a query (select command) over an already opened SQLite database
 object.
functions.summary: Executes a query (select command) over an already opened SQLite database object.

parameters.name: conn
parameters.description: an already opened SQLite database object as xs:anyURI.

parameters.name: sqlstr
parameters.description: the query to be executed as xs:string.

returns.description: a sequence of JSON objects describing each row returned.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-SQLITE-OBJECT if $conn is not a valid SQLite database object.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-SQL-STATEMENT if $stmnt is not a valid sql command.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: execute-update-prepared
functions.description:
Execute a update command over an already connected SQLite
 database object.
functions.summary: Execute a update command over an already connected SQLite database object.

parameters.name: pstmnt
parameters.description: the update command to be executed as xs:anyURI.

returns.description: an integer that represents the amount of rows affected.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-PREPARED-STATEMENT if $pstmnt is not a valid SQLite prepared statement.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: execute-update
functions.signature: ($conn as xs:anyURI, $sqlstr as xs:string) as xs:integer external
functions.description: Executes an update command over an already opened SQLite database object.
functions.summary: Executes an update command over an already opened SQLite database object.

parameters.name: conn
parameters.description: an already opened SQLite database object as xs:anyURI.

parameters.name: sqlstr
parameters.description: the update command to be executed as xs:string.

returns.description: the amount of rows modified by such update command.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-SQLITE-OBJECT if $conn is not a valid SQLite database object.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-SQL-STATEMENT if $stmnt is not a valid sql command.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: is-connected
functions.description: Returns whether on not the passed SQLite database object is connected.
functions.summary: Returns whether on not the passed SQLite database object is connected.

parameters.name: conn
parameters.description: the SQLite database object as xs:anyURI.

returns.description: true if the given SQLite database object is connected, false otherwise.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-SQLITE-OBJECT if $conn is not a valid SQLite database object.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: metadata
functions.description:
Returns the metadata associated to a given prepared SQLite statement.

SQLite metadata is returned in the following form: 

 {
   "columns" :
       [{
           "name"          : <column name>,
           "table"         : <table name>,
           "database"      : <database name>,
           "type"          : <type name>,
           "collation"     : [BINARY|NOCASE|RTRIM],
           "nullable"      : [true|false],
           "primary key"   : [true|false],
           "autoincrement" : [true|false]
       }*]
 }
functions.summary: Returns the metadata associated to a given prepared SQLite statement.

parameters.name: pstmnt
parameters.description: the sql command as xs:anyURI from which metadata will be extracted.

returns.description: a object() with the associated the metadata.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-PREPARED-STATEMENT if $pstmnt is not a valid SQLite prepared statement.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:UNAVAILABLE-METADATA if no metadata is available (SQLite library compiled without SQLITE_ENABLE_COLUMN_METADATA).</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: prepare-statement
functions.signature: ($conn as xs:anyURI, $stmnt as xs:string) as xs:anyURI external
functions.description:
Compiles a prepared statement based on an already connected SQLite database and a string that defines the sql command.

You can use '?' in the sql command as placeholders so you will be able to bind variables later to such places.
functions.summary: Compiles a prepared statement based on an already connected SQLite database and a string that defines the sql command.

parameters.name: conn
parameters.description: the SQLite database object as xs:anyURI.

parameters.name: stmnt
parameters.description: the sql command as xs:string.

returns.description: a xs:anyURI object representing the prepared statement.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-SQLITE-OBJECT if $conn is not a valid SQLite database object.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-SQL-STATEMENT if $stmnt is not a valid sql command.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: rollback
functions.description: Rollbacks all pending update operations in this SQLite database.
functions.summary: Rollbacks all pending update operations in this SQLite database.

parameters.name: conn
parameters.description: the SQLite database object as xs:anyURI.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-SQLITE-OBJECT if $conn is not a valid SQLite database object.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: set-boolean
functions.signature: ($pstmnt as xs:anyURI, $param-num as xs:integer, $val as xs:boolean) as empty-sequence() external
functions.description: Binds a boolean to a placeholder inside a prepared statement.
functions.summary: Binds a boolean to a placeholder inside a prepared statement.

parameters.name: pstmnt
parameters.description: the prepared statement already compiled as xs:anyURI.

parameters.name: param-num
parameters.description: the placeholder position to be set.

parameters.name: val
parameters.description: the boolean to be bind in such placeholder.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-PREPARED-STATEMENT if $pstmnt is not a valid SQLite prepared statement.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-PLACEHOLDER-POSITION if $param-num is not a valid position.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: set-null
functions.signature: ($pstmnt as xs:anyURI, $param-num as xs:integer) as empty-sequence() external
functions.description: Set a null to a placeholder inside a prepared statement.
functions.summary: Set a null to a placeholder inside a prepared statement.

parameters.name: pstmnt
parameters.description: the prepared statement already compiled as xs:anyURI.

parameters.name: param-num
parameters.description: the placeholder position to be set.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-PREPARED-STATEMENT if $pstmnt is not a valid SQLite prepared statement.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-PLACEHOLDER-POSITION if $param-num is not a valid position.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: set-numeric
functions.signature: ($pstmnt as xs:anyURI, $param-num as xs:integer, $val as xs:anyAtomicType) as empty-sequence() external
functions.description: Binds a double variable to a placeholder inside a prepared statement.
functions.summary: Binds a double variable to a placeholder inside a prepared statement.

parameters.name: pstmnt
parameters.description: the prepared statement already compiled as xs:anyURI.

parameters.name: param-num
parameters.description: the placeholder position to be set.

parameters.name: val
parameters.description: a xs:double, xs:integer or xs:decimal to be bind in such placeholder.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-PREPARED-STATEMENT if $pstmnt is not a valid SQLite prepared statement.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-PLACEHOLDER-POSITION if $param-num is not a valid position.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-VALUE if $val is not a valid numeric type.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: set-string
functions.signature: ($pstmnt as xs:anyURI, $param-num as xs:integer, $val as xs:string) as empty-sequence() external
functions.description: Binds a string variable to a placeholder inside a prepared statement.
functions.summary: Binds a string variable to a placeholder inside a prepared statement.

parameters.name: pstmnt
parameters.description: the prepared statement already compiled as xs:anyURI.

parameters.name: param-num
parameters.description: the placeholder position to be set.

parameters.name: val
parameters.description: a string to be bind in such placeholder.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-PREPARED-STATEMENT if $pstmnt is not a valid SQLite prepared statement.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-PLACEHOLDER-POSITION if $param-num is not a valid position.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: set-value
functions.signature: ($pstmnt as xs:anyURI, $param-num as xs:integer, $val as item()) as empty-sequence() external
functions.description:
Binds a value to a placeholder inside a prepared statement using the
 same type as the item given.
functions.summary: Binds a value to a placeholder inside a prepared statement using the same type as the item given.

parameters.name: pstmnt
parameters.description: the prepared statement already compiled as xs:anyURI.

parameters.name: param-num
parameters.description: the placeholder position to be set.

parameters.name: val
parameters.description: the value to be bind in such placeholder.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-PREPARED-STATEMENT if $pstmnt is not a valid SQLite prepared statement.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-PLACEHOLDER-POSITION if $param-num is not a valid position.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INVALID-VALUE if $val is not a valid value.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">s:INTERNAL-SQLITE-PROBLEM if there was an internal error inside SQLite library.</xqdoc:error>
